doc.title: La herencia del ranchero
doc.plot: Uncle Aniceto passes away, and much to the displeasure of his family, leaves his fortune to his good friend Genovevo. Soon after, Genovevo "disappears," and a new will appears, leaving the inheritance to whomever finds Genovevo dead or alive! This box-office hit is a hilarious comedy of errors, made extra special with a top cast of Mexican favorites.
